activities: Nor1 provides a process to upgrade hotel guests to a higher level room, at a discount based upon availability. We collect data on interested parties, and forward to the hotels. We never collect credit card information, but rather base level data on their hotel stay.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Hotel Guest stay information, Hotel guest email address (in certain instances)
privacyprograms: We are a member of the Direct Marketing Association ("DMA") Safe Harbor Program
recoursemech: DMA is our 3rd Party Dispute Resolution Service Provider
